TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorConvertedBitmapExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: Implements a markup extension that enables creation.

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables creation.

summary.span: A does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.

span.span: A does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa classe é uma implementação de extensão de marcação.This class is a markup extension implementation. Classes de extensão de marcação existe principalmente para oferecer suporte à infraestrutura para alguns aspectos do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] implementação do processador e os membros expostos por uma extensão de marcação não normalmente são chamados de código do usuário.Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. Essa extensão oferece suporte a [extensão de Marcação ColorConvertedBitmap](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md) uso de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].This extension supports the [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Uso de texto XAMLXAML Text Usage Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de Marcação ColorConvertedBitmap](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
